mapper.insert: insert into refrigerate_room(id, name, max_volume,status, ccc_id, createTime) value (#{id},#{name},#{maxVolume},1,#{cccId},now())
mapper.select: select refrigerate_room.*,cold_chain_center.name as centreName from refrigerate_room,cold_chain_center where refrigerate_room.id=#{id} and cold_chain_center.id=refrigerate_room.ccc_id;
select refrigerate_room.* from refrigerate_room,room_goods where refrigerate_room.id=room_goods.rm_id and room_goods.goods_id=#{goodsId}
